ygData.messageBody:
Hi, i'm new meself. I don;t even have the game yet.

  masterkiis_nara <masterkiis_nara@...> wrote:

I am really new at the game (have been playing only about a
month)...i am on the Ayonae Ro server with a couple of characters
(lvl 9 Barb Warrior and lvl 5 Cleric...told you I was new...LOL) Was
just curious if anyone else in on that server...usually am hunting
with the love of my life who is teaching me the game but would be fun
to pass a friendly "Hail" to those here on the list should our paths
cross...would that be proper and acceptable EQ etiquette??  Just
curious  :-)

Naara
